page.title: 17Gayton Flower Festival
page.content: The village flower festival is an annual fund raising event for St Mary's Church. Many people from the village produce individual flower arrangements to decorate the church - the end result is breathtaking. People come from many miles around to see the display which is open to the public from Friday to Sunday during a weekend in May ( 2 weeks after May Day ). During the time of the festival there is also an exhibition of paintings by a famous artist who lives in the village. On the Saturday there is a mini-market on the village green with refreshments, a pets corner, and competitions for all the family. The flower festival usually raises over 1,000 pounds for the church.
